issue.title: [Dev][Archery] Warning about RUST variable in "archery docker run"
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12757](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12757). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This spurious warning is being displayed:
```Java

$ archery docker run conda-python-hdfs bash
WARNING: The RUST variable is not set. Defaulting to a blank string.
Pulling conda ... done
WARNING: The RUST variable is not set. Defaulting to a blank string.
Pulling conda-cpp ... done
[...]
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12757?focusedCommentId=17343810) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10304
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10304>
